meanings.definition: The quality of being farfetched or improbable.
meanings.sent1: The farfetchedness of the story made it hard to believe.
meanings.sent2: Her explanation had a touch of farfetchedness to it.
meanings.sent3: The farfetchedness of his excuse made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The idea of time travel seemed like pure farfetchedness.
meanings.sent5: The farfetchedness of the plan was evident to all.

meanings.definition: Something that is farfetched or improbable.
meanings.sent1: The movie's plot was full of farfetchedness.
meanings.sent2: She dismissed his theory as mere farfetchedness.
meanings.sent3: The farfetchedness of the proposal left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were filled with farfetchedness and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The story's farfetchedness added an element of surprise.
